type.description: Payment type options.

enumValues.name: MERCHANT
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier.

enumValues.name: DIRECT
enumValues.description: Payment is made directly to the actual payee (e.g., the hotel), without involving an intermediary or third party. The payment will be completed at check-in.

enumValues.name: CARD_BOOKING
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier. The payment is effectuated at the time of booking.

enumValues.name: CARD_CHECK_IN
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier and is made at the hotel during check-in.

fields.name: rateRule
fields.description: "NoRatePlanType" indicates absence of a specific rate plan. "LargeFamily" and "PublicServant" denote rates tailored for those groups. "Negotiated" and "Package" signify negotiated rates and package deals, respectively. "CanaryResident" and "BalearicResident" are special rates for residents of the Canary Islands and the Balearic Islands, respectively. Lastly, "HoneyMoon" designates rates intended for honeymooners or couples celebrating their honeymoon.

fields.name: seniorRule
fields.description: "NoSeniorRate" indicates the absence of a senior rate. "SeniorRate_55", "SeniorRate_60", and "SeniorRate_65" denote rates applicable to individuals aged 55, 60, and 65, respectively. These rates are typically offered to seniors as a special discount or incentive.

type.name: PaymentType
type.description: Payment type options.

enumValues.name: MERCHANT
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier.

enumValues.name: DIRECT
enumValues.description: Payment is made directly to the actual payee (e.g., the hotel), without involving an intermediary or third party. The payment will be completed at check-in.

enumValues.name: CARD_BOOKING
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier. The payment is effectuated at the time of booking.

enumValues.name: CARD_CHECK_IN
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier and is made at the hotel during check-in.

inputFields.name: rateRule
inputFields.description: "NoRatePlanType" indicates absence of a specific rate plan. "LargeFamily" and "PublicServant" denote rates tailored for those groups. "Negotiated" and "Package" signify negotiated rates and package deals, respectively. "CanaryResident" and "BalearicResident" are special rates for residents of the Canary Islands and the Balearic Islands, respectively. Lastly, "HoneyMoon" designates rates intended for honeymooners or couples celebrating their honeymoon.

inputFields.name: seniorRule
inputFields.description: "NoSeniorRate" indicates the absence of a senior rate. "SeniorRate_55", "SeniorRate_60", and "SeniorRate_65" denote rates applicable to individuals aged 55, 60, and 65, respectively. These rates are typically offered to seniors as a special discount or incentive.

type.description: Payment type options.

enumValues.name: MERCHANT
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier.

enumValues.name: DIRECT
enumValues.description: Payment is made directly to the actual payee (e.g., the hotel), without involving an intermediary or third party. The payment will be completed at check-in.

enumValues.name: CARD_BOOKING
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier. The payment is effectuated at the time of booking.

enumValues.name: CARD_CHECK_IN
enumValues.description: Payment is managed by the supplier and is made at the hotel during check-in.

inputFields.name: rateRule
inputFields.description: "NoRatePlanType" indicates absence of a specific rate plan. "LargeFamily" and "PublicServant" denote rates tailored for those groups. "Negotiated" and "Package" signify negotiated rates and package deals, respectively. "CanaryResident" and "BalearicResident" are special rates for residents of the Canary Islands and the Balearic Islands, respectively. Lastly, "HoneyMoon" designates rates intended for honeymooners or couples celebrating their honeymoon.

inputFields.name: seniorRule
inputFields.description: "NoSeniorRate" indicates the absence of a senior rate. "SeniorRate_55", "SeniorRate_60", and "SeniorRate_65" denote rates applicable to individuals aged 55, 60, and 65, respectively. These rates are typically offered to seniors as a special discount or incentive.
